title: Theodore Roosevelt Island: Brochures
body: Brochures            Theodore Roosevelt Island Download this vintage brochure to learn more about Theodore Roosevelt's legacy and the history of his memorial.           Theodore Roosevelt Island Trail Map Download this simple trail map to take with you while you explore the island.           Birds of Theodore Roosevelt Island Theodore Roosevelt was a life-long birder. Use this handy bird checklist to keep track of what you see when you visit his memorial.           Mount Vernon Trail Eighteen miles of paved multi-use trail stretch from Theodore Roosevelt Island to Mount Vernon. Download this brochure to learn more about attractions and facilities along the trail.
